headline: Viavi Solutions (VIAV) Partners With CrowdStrike For Enhanced IT and Security Visibility
summary: Viavi Solutions (VIAV) recently announced a partnership with CrowdStrike, which enhances security and IT operations visibility. The company's share price increased by 24% in the last quarter, likely supported by positive market trends and its strategic movements. Other company developments include Netomnia's adoption of VIAVI's testing systems and improved earnings figures. These factors align well with broader market optimism, as indicated by the S&P 500 and Nasdaq hitting record highs...

headline: CrowdStrike and Amazon Business Prime Transform Cybersecurity for Small Businesses
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, September 10, 2025--CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today announced a strategic collaboration with Business Prime that makes world-class cybersecurity available to small and medium businesses (SMBs) at no cost. Starting immediately, Business Prime Essentials, Small, Medium, and Enterprise members are eligible for CrowdStrike Falcon® Go – the industry's award-winning AI-powered cybersecurity platform purpose-built for SMBs – as a free benefit of their paid membership, a savings of $59.9

headline: TD Cowen Rates CrowdStrike Holdings (CRWD) as a ‘Buy’ on Strong Platform Adoption
summary: CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:CRWD) is one of the best cybersecurity stocks to buy right now. On August 28, TD Cowen reiterated a ‘Buy’ rating on the stock and a $500 price target. The research firm’s positive stance follows the company’s solid second-quarter fiscal 2026 results, which affirmed strong demand for cybersecurity solutions. The cybersecurity firm […]

headline: VIAVI Announces New Integration with CrowdStrike Falcon® Next-Gen SIEM
summary: VIAVI Solutions Inc. (VIAVI) (NASDAQ: VIAV) today announced a partnership with CrowdStrike to integrate the VIAVI Observer network observability platform with CrowdStrike Falcon® Next-Gen SIEM. VIAVI brings end-user experience insights with network and service performance intelligence into Falcon Next-Gen SIEM, providing joint customers with deeper visibility across their security and IT operations.
